subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lamb had 25 points and 8 rebounds as No. 17 Connecticut overcame a 10-point second-half deficit to beat visiting West Virginia, 64-57.
snippet: Jeremy Lamb had 25 points and 8 rebounds as No. 17 Connecticut overcame a 10-point second-half deficit to beat visiting West Virginia, 64-57.
